players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I'm saddened by Charlie's death. We should all share any suspicions we have to root out the mafia."
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We should vote her out."
You: "Alice is not the mafioso. Diana is trying to mislead us because she feels threatened after her investigation failed. We should discuss this further before making a hasty decision."
You: "Alice is not the mafioso. Diana is trying to mislead us because she feels threatened after her investigation failed. We should discuss this further before making a hasty decision."
Diana: "I stand by my investigation; Alice is the mafioso. Bob, we need to vote her out now to protect the town."
